ModMetaData.name: Rimworld Exploration Mode
ModMetaData.author: TheLastBulletBender
ModMetaData.description:
Why is it that your naked and lost pawns know about the locations of faction bases and terrain on the planet? Want to have a challenging experience exploring the planet for the first time? This mod implements map exploration with fog-of-war and some caravan overhaul.
Mod Features: unexplored tiles and world-level fog-of-war. river movement penalty. sight penalty over difficult terrain.
Future Plans: Maps and Satellites
